VAMPIRICA.name: Bloody Tear
VAMPIRICA.description: Evolved Whip. Can deal critical damage and absorb HP.

HOLY_MISSILE.name: Holy Wand
HOLY_MISSILE.description: Evolved Magic Wand. Fires with no delay.

KNIFE.name: Knife
KNIFE.description: Fires quickly in the faced direction.

THOUSAND.name: Thousand Edge
THOUSAND.description: Evolved Knife. Fires with no delay.

CROSS.name: Cross
CROSS.description: Aims at nearest enemy, has boomerang effect.

HEAVENSWORD.name: Heaven Sword
HEAVENSWORD.description: Evolved Cross. Can deal critical damage.

FIREBALL.name: Fire Wand
FIREBALL.description: Fires at a random enemy, deals heavy damage.

HELLFIRE.name: Hellfire
HELLFIRE.description: Evolved Fire Wand. Passes through enemies.

GARLIC.name: Garlic
GARLIC.description: Damages nearby enemies. Reduces resistance to knockback and freeze.

VORTEX.name: Soul Eater
VORTEX.description: Evolved Garlic. Steals hearts. Power increases when recovering HP.

BORA.name: La Borra
BORA.description: Evolved Santa Water. Damaging zones follow you and grow when they move.

ROCHER.name: NO FUTURE
ROCHER.description: Evolved Runetracer. Explodes when bouncing and in retaliation.

LOOP.name: Thunder Loop
LOOP.description: Evolved Lightning Ring. Projectiles strike twice.

PENTAGRAM.name: Pentagram
PENTAGRAM.tips: Best with: Cooldown and Luck only.

SIRE.name: Gorgeous Moon
SIRE.description: Evolved Pentagram. Generates extra gems and gathers all of them.

SILF3.name: Vandalier
SILF3.description: Union of Ebony Wings and Peachone.

GUNS.name: Phiera Der Tuphello
GUNS.description: Fires quickly in four fixed directions.

GUNS2.name: Eight The Sparrow
GUNS2.description: Fires quickly in four fixed directions.

GUNS3.name: Phieraggi
GUNS3.description: Union of Phiera Der Tuphello and Eight The Sparrow. Scales with Revivals.

GATTI.name: Gatti Amari
GATTI.description: Summons capricious projectiles. Might interact with pickups.

STIGRANGATTI.name: Vicious Hunger
STIGRANGATTI.description: Evolved Gatti Amari. Might turn anything into gold.

MANNAGGIA.name: Mannajja
MANNAGGIA.description: Evolved Song of Mana. Might slow enemies down.

TRAPANO.name: Shadow Pinion
TRAPANO.description: Generates damaging zones when moving, strikes when stopping.

TRAPANO2.name: Valkyrie Turner
TRAPANO2.description: Evolved Shadow Pinion. Bigger, longer, faster, stronger.

LANCET.name: Clock Lancet
LANCET.description: Chance to freeze enemies in time.

CORRIDOR.name: Infinite Corridor
CORRIDOR.description: Evolved Clock Lancet. Halves enemies' health.

SHROUD.name: Crimson Shroud
SHROUD.description: Evolved Laurel. Caps incoming Damage at 10. Retaliates when losing charges.

VENTO.name: Vento Sacro
VENTO.description: Stronger with continuous movement. Can deal critical damage.

VENTO2.name: Fuwalafuwaloo
VENTO2.description: Union of Vento Sacro and Bloody Tear. Critical hits might generate explosions.

BONE2.name: Anima of Mortaccio
BONE2.description: Evolved Bone. Projectiles accelerate when bouncing.

CHERRY.name: Cherry Bomb
CHERRY.description: Throws a bouncing projectile. Explodes, sometimes.

CHERRY2.name: Yatta Daikarin
CHERRY2.description: Evolved Cherry Bomb. Generates extra explosions that can deal critical Luck-based damage.

CART2.name: Carréllo
CART2.description: Throws a bouncing projectile. Number of bounces affected by Amount.

FLOWER.name: Celestial Dusting
FLOWER.description: Throws a bouncing projectile. Cooldown reduces when moving.

FLOWER2.name: Profusione D'Amore
FLOWER2.description: Evolved Celestial Dusting. Projectiles generate a chain explosion at fixed intervals.

JUBILEE.name: Greatest Jubilee
JUBILEE.description: Has a chance to summon light sources.

TRIASSO1.name: Bracelet
TRIASSO1.description: Fires three projectiles at a random enemy.

TRIASSO2.name: Bi-Bracelet
TRIASSO2.description: Fires three projectiles at a random enemy.

TRIASSO3.name: Tri-Bracelet
TRIASSO3.description: Fires three projectiles at a random enemy.

CANDYBOX.name: Candybox
CANDYBOX.description: Allows you to choose any unlocked base weapon.
CANDYBOX.tips: Occurrence in level up options affected by Luck.

CANDYBOX2.name: Super Candybox II Turbo
CANDYBOX2.description: Gift of Candybox. Allows to choose among a selection of advanced weapons.

BATTILIA.name: Pako Battilia
BATTILIA.description: May fire additional times when losing health.

BATTILIA2.name: Mazzo Familiar
BATTILIA2.description: Evolved Pako Battilia. Damage and Amount affected by Max Health.

EX_AMMO1.name: Ammo Appalate
EX_AMMO1.description: Fires towards a random enemy in the faced direction.

EX_AMMO2.name: Gunastrophe
EX_AMMO2.description: Evolved Ammo Appalate. Fires all the guns across the screen.

VICTORY.name: Victory Sword
VICTORY.description: Strikes with a combo attack at the nearest enemy. Retaliates.
VICTORY.customDescValue: Enables critical hits and combo finisher.

SOLES.name: Sole Solution
SOLES.description: Gift of Victory Sword. The more enemies are defeated, the stronger it grows.
SOLES.tips: Requires Max: Victory Sword, Torrona's Box.

MISSPELL2.name: Ashes of Muspell
MISSPELL2.description: Evolved Flames of Misspell. The more enemies are defeated, the stronger it grows.

ICELANCE.name: Glass Fandango
ICELANCE.description: Stronger with movement, Orologions, and against frozen enemies.

ICELANCE2.name: Celestial Voulge
ICELANCE2.description: Evolved Glass Fandango. Might deal critical damage and freeze enemies. Turns Orologions into Starry Heavens.

SANTAJAVELIN.name: Santa Javelin
SANTAJAVELIN.description: Duration affects Amount. Can deal critical damage.

SANTAJAVELIN2.name: Seraphic Cry
SANTAJAVELIN2.description: Evolved Santa Javelin. Critical damage affected by Luck. Turns Rosaries into Weird Souls Purifiers.

EX_GAEA2.name: Embrace of Gaea
EX_GAEA2.description: Evolved Gaze of Gaea. Retaliates. Damage is increased while invulnerable.

EX_MAGISTONE1.name: Magi-Stones
EX_MAGISTONE1.description: Deals damage based on its Weapon Level.

EX_MAGISTONE2.name: Kyra-Stones
EX_MAGISTONE2.description: Evolved Magistone. Damage based on Player Level. Amount increases with enemies.

PHASER.name: Phas3r
PHASER.description: Generates thin damaging zones. Has high Amount scaling.

PHASER2.name: Photonstorm
PHASER2.description: Evolved Phas3r. May fire 2 to 10 times more projectiles depending on Luck.

ARMADIO.name: Arma Dio
ARMADIO.description: Allows you to choose any passive weapon.
ARMADIO.tips: Appearance in level up options affected by Luck.

ARMOR.name: Armor
ARMOR.description: Reduces incoming Damage by 1. Increases retaliatory Damage by 10%.

DURATION.name: Spellbinder
DURATION.description: Increases duration of weapon effects by 10%.

MAGNET.name: Attractorb
MAGNET.description: Character picks up items from further away.

CURSE.name: Skull O'Maniac
CURSE.description: Increases enemy speed, health, quantity, and frequency by 10%.

PANDORA.name: Torrona's Box
PANDORA.description: Cursed item, but increases Might, Projectile Speed, Duration, and Area by 4%.
PANDORA.override: Cursed item, but increases Might, Projectile Speed, Duration, and Area by 4%.
PANDORA.customOverrideValue: Cursed item, but increases Might, Projectile Speed, Duration, and Area by %0%

PARMA.name: Parm Aegis
PARMA.description: Increases invulnerability time after getting damaged by 50ms.

DOMINION.name: Karoma's Mana
DOMINION.description: Increases enemies spawn quantity by 10. Increases duration of Gold Fever and Gold Finger by 10%.

TETRAFORCE.name: Tetraforce
TETRAFORCE.description: The character starts gaining the chosen stat boost every level.

GUNS_COUNTER.name: Red Muscle
GUNS_COUNTER.description: Fires quickly in four fixed directions.

GUNS2_COUNTER.name: Twice Upon a Time
GUNS2_COUNTER.description: Fires quickly in four fixed directions.

GATTI_COUNTER.name: Flock Destroyer
GATTI_COUNTER.description: Summons capricious projectiles. Might interact with pickups.

SANTAJAVELINCOUNTER.name: Levelin'EEE
SANTAJAVELINCOUNTER.description: Duration affects Amount. Can deal critical damage.

LEFT.name: Metaglio Left
LEFT.description: Channels dark powers to protect the bearer.

RIGHT.name: Metaglio Right
RIGHT.description: Channels dark powers to curse the bearer.
